article_title: Bill Clinton says in KC that Hillary will stand up for average Americans

article_metadata.news-keywords: Bill Clinton, Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders, Kansas, Missouri, Kansas City, Democratic, polictics, presidential, primary, race, campaign
article_metadata.description: “I think she ought to be president because she is the best change-maker,” former president Bill Clinton said of wife Hillary before a midday Kansas City crowd Friday. “Too many people in too many places have been left out. … She will change that.” Her primary foe, Sen. Bernie Sanders, pushes ideas that reach beyond what’s likely ever to happen, Bill Clinton said.
article_metadata.title: Bill Clinton says in KC that Hillary will stand up for average Americans | The Kansas City Star
